Kris Senanu bụ onye ọchụnta ego Kenya bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa na Safaricom ugbu a
Tupu nke a ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Telkom Digital
Kris bụ onye isi Telco kachasị nta na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ ICT edepụtara
O nyere aka na mmalite nke Access Kenya (nke bụzi Internet Solutions) ma nyere ya aka ịghọ ụlọ ọrụ ICT mbụ edepụtara na Nairobi Securities Exchange
O nyere aka gbasaa nzọụkwụ azụmaahịa ahụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka ma duzie nnweta ya site na Dimension Data na 2014, tupu ọ pụọ dị ka osote onye isi oche ya, na 2016.
Kris Senanu bụ nwa nwoke nke agụmakwụkwọ Kwadzo Senanu

Kris Senanu gara USIU-A, na-enweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum na nchịkwa azụmahịa mba ụwa, na-emepe ahịa ahịa na akara ugo mmụta (MBA) na Strategic Management.sitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Mahadum Warwick.
Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa ugbu a na Safaricom

N'afọ 2001, o nyere aka guzobe AccessKenya Group, wee bụrụ onye isi ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2005, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa ya. N'afọ 2014, Internet Solutions (IS) nwetara AccessKenya Group, Senanu wee bụrụ osote onye isi oche ya. N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere Telkom Kenya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ.
Kris bụkwa Onye isi oche nke United States International University Council

Ndị isi oche ndị ọzọ ọ nwere n'oge gara aga na ugbu a gụnyere: Kansụl Na-achị Isi na Kenya Institute of Management, Onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Pan African BTL Africa, nke nwere isi na Ghana, na Mdundo nke bụ ikpo okwu egwu pan African
Kris bụ onye otu Chartered Institute of Marketing na Kenya Institute of Management
